span.style: display: block; text-align: right; cursor: pointer;

div.p:
Dear Families,
We are writing with a brief update on an extension of the school closures in Massachusetts that was just declared by Governor Baker today.

b.style: background-color: transparent; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); white-space: pre-wrap;

p.b: The school closure has now been extended until May 4th.

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We learned about this extension at the same time everyone else did. We will continue with our remote learning opportunities throughout the closure. We will update our parents and students as we receive more information from the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education. There will be a follow-up email regarding academic expectations by the end of this week.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We also would like to take this opportunity to encourage our community to stay home as much as possible. If you leave your home, it is essential to strictly follow social distancing guidelines by avoiding crowds, canceling social gatherings, and maintaining a safe separation of at least 6 feet from others. Restricting access to school buildings will have little impact on public health if these best practices are not followed in good faith.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.b: Grab and go lunches are available at our school for our free and reduced lunch students. No sign up is necessary. Just stop by between 12 and 1 pm.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.b: In addition to that, our parents/students can stop by our school between 10 am to 1 pm Monday through Friday to pick up a chromebook if their child(ren) have no access to a computer and a laptop at home. Please remember that Comcast has opened all of their “hotspots” throughout the country, even if you are not a Comcast customer. You can find information about how to link to their services here:

b.br: Comcast also has a free Internet Essentials program for low income families. More information on this program can be found here: https://www.internetessentials.com/

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Thank you for your patience and ongoing support during these very challenging times
